EmailTemplate.subject: Touch base w/ turbonomic (1495036200.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 98 Clean false false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Bryan,I feel short emails are most effective so I will keep it quick for you. I noticed our team has reached out to your organization in the past, however they appeared to be very brief and high level conversations. What we do:Assure application performance while cutting costs associated with managing the virtual environment. We allow companies to deliver reliable IT services at the lowest possible cost. How we do it: <[[http://mkto-sjp0104.com/ol/jEtZecbPL1xQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhJGUCxXSKxjKjYap9HUaF91dVk%2D7%2DkzGUX5N6NnxrZAEtTEDdpfBKPaOINsBS2NrgNRjrV9nDxAa5xsTIm3b8z8IKpWr%2D%5Fy0eBpGrh1We0AH90yPWx4GaYPY1Ev%2D5UhUh14H4sevra1xyU%2D6Ym%5FAs2x%2DVO3zV22%5FUiOedizQmPeR765t2oFuk8ZOWzt%5Fr%2Dhsp9ehw60pwXKWbBGHOBXomVUzRz%5FEqYlwIVJAI8fyRcIcF%5Fqx2K5E19Lro3FCezoSQF3lUS9%5Ft1x6vNtRe7YXq4ajb8lhyhlknmbw%2C%2C/jEpXcszPKVlNoVcspLONbLrkmDvBdp29tb0zCvjrncpvzQd9PbmAPhC3jOJZHsIBMuW9WQY0PqBj915WSvjDcNJio%5FtwIW%5FlTG7HuabeYZlsXIMh%5Fvcsxo70yHhT%5FMu1xmWVXG0jFSdoVT6Kb%2D4UyTn%2DPMBxABfa8m%5FVJcJwnW1ag%5FhW0IukaKehtXGlsBbA6DHcAnVK7fSo31%5F6DZR6wMQI4hd0ugR%2DL7emu2GVk%2Dx0%5FnB99OFn1gxmq6p2IZs85BWKDyHg4tuqHulvEOLikuOk5KhwOUll2tN9PWPaPWSnAIHFKzpE0Di2nBY6YRVXMjtwH%5F8osSGslmEfJc0CThiCnAMEnHkz3bl68bnypga0MSnhChXZiBGn%5FgjleqVHkVA%2C]]> Results:· -increase vm density (25-50%) ex.
